name: Pakka Pets
blurb: A new pet game adventure for your phone. Discover rare evolutions, decorate, explore different worlds & fulfill your pet's destiny!

rewards.reward: No Reward
Pakka Pets for iPhone or Android + Lil' Sack of Gems ============================== The game + A little sack of gems (in game) to buy awesome Pakka treasures with!

Pakka Pets for iPhone or Android + MYSTERY PAKKA EGG + SACK OF GEMS + EXCLUSIVE ROOM DECOR
==============================
A permanent & re-hatchable Mystery Pakka Egg with a full branching evolution family tree (in addition to your starting egg)
+ A big sack of gems (in game) to buy awesome Pakka treasures with!
+ Kickstarter exclusive in-game poster decoration, room buddy decoration, and exclusive in-game Wallpaper

ADVENTUER: PREVIOUS TIER + 3 TICKETS,  3 RARE POTIONS, 5 SECRET RECIPES! ============================== 
+3 BUS TICKETS to exotic locations in the Pakka world!
+3 RARE POTIONS to help raise your pets
+5 CRAFTING RECIPES to make sure your pet is well fed!
+ All previous rewards

EXCLUSIVE KICKSTARTER EGG!!! + Digital Instruction Book
==============================
A permanent & re-hatchable backer-ONLY pet egg, containing a whole genealogy of exclusive pets! A PDF instructional booklet packed with Pakka secrets!
+ All previous rewards

PHYSICAL INSTRUCTIONAL BOOKLET + SECRET CHEAT CODE
==============================
A physical game booklet to teach you about the Pakka world.
+ All previous rewards

PAKKA WEALTH: EXCLUSIVE RECIPE PACK + ANOTHER SACK OF GEMS + RARE FURNITURE
==============================
A secret cookbook containing ancient magic Pakka recipes
+ Another sack of gems
+ A secret download code for a special super rare furniture set
+ All previous rewards

DIGITAL ONLY: RED or BLUE Pack! - Lower cost, nothing physical! ==============================\r\nOnly want our super sweet digital in-game rewards without the hassle of physical shipping? Now get your choice of the Red or Blue Pack (listed below at the $75 mark) at a lower cost, without the phone case or physical instruction booklet! + All previous rewards (no phone case or physical booklet)

BEAUTIFUL PAKKA IOS/ANDROID CASE
==============================
A stylish Pakka Pets phone case!
+ All previous rewards

RED SECRET ITEM PACK ==============================
Time Machine
+ Ghost Bottle
+ Red secret recipe book (Read below of info on each item!)
+ All previous rewards

BLUE SECRET ITEM PACK ==============================
Weather Machine
+ Seeds from the Life-Life Plant
+ Blue secret recipe book (Read below for info on each item!)
+ All previous rewards

DIGITAL ONLY: GOLD PACK - Lower cost,  nothing physical! ============================== Only want our super sweet digital in-game rewards without the hassle of physical shipping? Includes BOTH Red and Blue Secret item packs, 2x more Gems at a lower cost.  + All previous rewards (no phone case or physical booklet)
GOLD PACK\r\n==============================\r\nIncludes BOTH Red and Blue Secret item packs, 2x more Gems + all previous rewards!

SPECIAL EDITION PAKKA GEAR
==============================
Limited special edition special Tee-Shirt
+ Phone Case is upgraded to a limited special edition 
+ Instructional Booklet is upgraded to a limited special edition 
+ all previous rewards including Gold Pack

I WAS HERE!!!
==============================
Your name appears as magical cave writing in the mystic Pakka caves
+ all previous rewards including Gold Pack.

DESIGN AN IN GAME OBJECT / DECORATION!!!
==============================
Work with us to turn you favorite object, furniture or food into an in-game Pakka treasure!
+ Includes all previous, non-limited rewards! 
+ Includes Gold Pack!

ORIGINAL ART PIECE!!!
==============================
Willem (our Artist & Game designer) will hand draw an original piece of Pakka Art just for you. 
+ Includes all rewards from Limited Edition Pakka Gear
VIP AT LAUNCH PARTY!!!\r\n==============================\r\nYour invited to the Pakka Pets Launch Party! + Includes all rewards from Limited Edition Pakka Gear

VIP + DESIGN A LOCATION: SUPER!!!\r\n==============================\r\nDesign a character and part of the Pakka World! Work with us to design a Pakka Resident and the place he lives! + Includes Design an Object/Decoration + Includes all rewards from Limited Edition Pakka Gear

HERO.
==============================
Spend the day with us in San Francisco! We’ll fly you out to meet us, show you our place of work, favorite coffee shop and give you the inside scoop on Pakka Pets, its design, history and it’s secrets.
+ Includes every previous reward!
